Our green initiative- Adopt A Plant (ADAPT) plants saplings across all campuses with LFT Clubs once a year.

This campaign is usually conducted in the month of September by each college unit. As a part of the campaign the students motivate their peers to join them in planting and adopting a plant. These students come together to plant saplings in over 100 locations in and around their colleges.

A total of 8000 saplings have been planted and adopted by the LFT members from various college clubs who pledged to plant and nurture the saplings in their years on campus.
